title: Pharo ACM
description: DeFi/Crypto/Catalyst/Cardano is not mainstream and it is difficult to onboard new people into the crypto markets.
solution: Pharo engages the public w/auto cover maker that allows buyers to protect expenses and allows crowd-sourced liquidity and rev generation.
experience: Submitted in Fund 5. Smart contracts on polygon and ethereum are in testnet. 20+ years in insurance, 5+ years in blockchain
